item.description:
Single Mingle @ McFadden’s Pub Friday Jan 30th 7-12
……………………………..

Take the stress and awkwardness out of the first date.
Meet other Singles at a Mingle.
Save time, money, gas & calories !!

Fun Single Professionals – Ice Breakers - DJ – Food & Full Cash Bar.

C-cktail Mingle Friday 30 Jan from 7:00-9:00 .... DJ 9:00 - close
7-9 is a great time to chat and make new friends - please come early

Single Mingle at McFadden's Restaurant & Saloon
Friday 30 Jan 09
52 Pine St (off Dorrance)
Providence RI 401.861.1782

$10 cover

Come meet other singles from RI and SE Mass.

As Always - Please Dress to Impress - No Jeans, Sneakers or T-Shirts
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Single Mingle - We Have a Private Room.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club
